obj_ch3_GSB01_slash_Step_0_gml_56_0: * WELCOME back^1, everyone^1, to the show that'll make you SCREAM at your SCREEN^1,/
obj_ch3_GSB01_slash_Step_0_gml_87_0: * Today's episode is brought to you by our sponsor.../%
obj_ch3_GSB01_slash_Step_0_gml_100_0: * The gushing pillar of darkness that gives us all form -&\O1!!\M1/%
obj_ch3_GSB01_slash_Step_0_gml_112_0: * Now available in unsettling obsidian and pulsating rainbow!/
obj_ch3_GSB01_slash_Step_0_gml_145_0: * Slather on that sunscreen^1, everyone^1! Because.../
obj_ch3_GSB01_slash_Step_0_gml_146_0: * Today's second - and FINAL - board will be an aquatic adventure to a desert island!/
obj_ch3_GSB01_slash_Step_0_gml_148_0: * That's right -- an all-expenses paid trip to a beautiful tropical paradise!!/
obj_ch3_GSB01_slash_Step_0_gml_150_0: * Haha^1! Wish I could go but I'm just a big electric box attached to the wall!^1! Haha!!/
obj_ch3_GSB01_slash_Step_0_gml_187_0: * For this BOARD's GOAL^1, you'll be aiming to enter the floating ATLANTIS STADIUM!/
obj_ch3_GSB01_slash_Step_0_gml_189_0: * Legend has it^1, the best way there is our super high budget RAINBOW BRIDGE!/
obj_ch3_GSB01_slash_Step_0_gml_191_0: * However^1, the RAINBOW only appears if TWO \O4 meet at LOVER'S CLIFF!/
obj_ch3_GSB01_slash_Step_0_gml_193_0: * By the way^1, don't forget to take lots of PHOTOS while you're on vacation!/
obj_ch3_GSB01_slash_Step_0_gml_195_0: * Now^1, we're gonna have some real fun in the sun today^1, SO DON'T TOUCH THAT DIAL!/
